name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Fullstack Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing robust applications, emphasizing skills in **React**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, **Express**, and **AWS** services such as **EC2**, **Lambda**, and **S3**. Strong proficiency in creating dynamic user interfaces and backend systems, complemented by expertise in **Python** and various frameworks like **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **Flask**. Skilled in integrating databases such as **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**, and implementing CI/CD practices. Proven ability to innovate and drive impactful projects at prestigious organizations like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, ensuring high performance and scalability across the tech stack.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **React** and **TypeScript** to engineer dynamic user interfaces, enhancing application responsiveness and user experience across **9** different web applications.
Implemented state management solutions using **Redux** and **Hooks**, driving efficient data flow and UI updates, resulting in a **40%** improvement in application performance.
Developed backend services with **Node.js** and **Express**, creating RESTful APIs for frontend consumption and integrating seamlessly with **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB** databases.
Ensured code quality and performance through CI/CD pipelines, adopting best practices and leveraging tools such as **AWS** **EC2**, **Lambda**, and **S3** for efficient deployment.
Conducted thorough testing using **Lighthouse** and **Axe**, ensuring accessibility standards while achieving a **95%** score for performance metrics across multiple projects.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to address system integration challenges, with a focus on maintaining data consistency and compliance across applications while overseeing release strategies.

Developed full-stack applications utilizing **React**, **TypeScript**, and **Node.js** that enhance user experiences and optimize performance.
Implemented state management solutions using **Redux** and **Hooks** for scalable and maintainable application architectures, improving efficiency by **30%**.
Designed and built RESTful APIs and integrated **GraphQL** for seamless data interaction, achieving a **25%** reduction in data retrieval time.
Utilized **HTML** and **CSS** to create responsive user interfaces that meet accessibility standards, validated by tools like **Lighthouse** and **Axe**.
Collaborated extensively with backend services using **Express** and integrated databases like **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB** for robust data management.
Managed CI/CD pipelines enabling automated testing and deployment, reducing release times by **40%**.
Engaged with cloud technologies including **AWS** services such as **EC2**, **Lambda**, and **S3** to ensure application scalability and resiliency.
Leveraged **Python** for backend development, including automation of workflows and data processing tasks, resulting in improved operational efficiency.

• Developed and maintained scalable web applications utilizing **React**, **TypeScript**, and **Node.js** to enhance user experience and engagement.
• Engineered efficient state management solutions with **Redux** and **Hooks** for responsive UI behavior.
• Implemented robust backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking using **Python**, **Flask**, and **PostgreSQL**, boosting trading operation efficiency by **30%**.
• Created real-time price feed processors leveraging **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis**, achieving a **50ms** latency for high-frequency transactions.
• Collaborated with frontend teams to provide data through **REST APIs** and **GraphQL**, ensuring seamless data flow and interaction on platforms.
• Ensured compliance with regulatory standards such as **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while maintaining data security protocols, fostering trust and reliability in the platform.
• Designed and executed comprehensive test suites with **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, streamlining QA and CI processes, and reducing bugs by **40%**.
• Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions using **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution time by **25%** and enhancing overall system performance.
